elements.title: named a sewage plant after him (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that after John Oliver remarked that "the city of Danbury, Connecticut, can eat my whole ass", they named a sewage plant after him?

elements.title: Anton Josef Reiss (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Anton Josef Reiss created a marble Pietà sculpture for Cologne's St. Gereon?

elements.title: Timewasters (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that racially themed time-travel comedy Timewasters was developed under the working title Black to the Future?

elements.title: Forbes Log (Wikipedia — did you know?)

elements.title: William Whaley (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that William Whaley advised William Earle to "purchase all the elephants teeth you possible can"?

elements.title: 男子充9万话费：90年都用不完 结局扎心了 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 贵州一高校军训出动直升机 原因公布：这画面学生高呼太帅 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 男子打赏女主播30万后被拉黑：跳河轻生死亡 (快科技)
elements.contents:
